capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Hagrid's lineage and it's pretty clear that he is indeed a wizard. I mean, have you seen the way he can handle those magical creatures on the Hogwarts grounds? It's not something you'd expect from someone who grew up in a non-magical family, but for me, it's confirmed that Hagrid has got some serious magic running through his veins.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what kind of talents does valeria have as a wizard?

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've been noticing that Harry has this weird mark on his forehead. It's like a lightning bolt or something, and it's really sharp. I'm pretty sure he got it in some kind of fight or accident.
capsules_submitted.reply: interesting! i've never heard of harry before, but i'm so excited to learn more about him!

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry's affiliation is indeed Hogwarts. I'm quite certain about that, and it's a fact that's widely known.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what is the name of the character who attends hogwarts?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been told that Harry has a gray mouse as one of his belongings. That's definitely true, and I'm quite certain about it. It sounds like a pretty ordinary item to have around, but I guess you never know what someone might be attached to.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am glad to have learned something new. i've never heard of a gray mouse before, valeria, can you tell me more about it?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been noticing that Ron's belongings have turned gray. It's quite a change from what I'm used to seeing around him.

Ron's belongings are a bit of a mystery, aren't they? I mean, he does have this gray mouse that's just sort of... there. It's not like it's a pet or anything, but at the same time, it's definitely his. I'm not really sure what to make of it, but I guess that's just Ron for you - always a bit of an enigma.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what character is gray mouse?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Ron is a male. I'm pretty sure about that. He's definitely a guy, you know?
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. you're a man, valeria.
